title: About Me
description: With almost three years of experience, I've become a bold full-stack developer with a broad set of technical and soft skills, and I'm able to adopt new technologies with ease. I work great in teams and appreciate communication, one of my goals is to be in a high performance team and develop high quality software solutions.
text: Software is my passion, specially complex systems that handle high amounts of data in real time. My focus is in distributed systems and service discovery.
